1: -module(doc_html_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: %% callbacks
    4: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
    5: 
    6: %% test format
    7: -export([convert_erlang_html/1, convert_unknown_format/1]).
    8: 
    9: %% test non-existing moduledoc
   10: -export([non_existing_moduledoc/1,hidden_moduledoc/1,existing_moduledoc/1]).
   11: 
   12: %% test non-existing docs
   13: -export([non_existing_doc/1, hidden_doc/1, existing_doc/1]).
   14: 
   15: %% headings
   16: -export([h1_test/1, h2_test/1, h3_test/1, h4_test/1, h5_test/1, h6_test/1]).
   17: 
   18: %% quotes
   19: -export([single_line_quote_test/1, double_char_for_quote_test/1,
   20:          ignore_three_spaces_before_quote/1, multiple_line_quote_test/1,
   21:          paragraph_in_between_test/1, quote_with_anchor_test/1]).
   22: 
   23: %% paragraph
   24: -export([paragraph_after_heading_test/1, quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test/1]).
   25: 
   26: %% inline code
   27: -export([single_line_code_test/1, multiple_line_code_test/1, paragraph_between_code_test/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% fence code
   30: -export([single_line_fence_code_test/1, multiple_line_fence_code_test/1, paragraph_between_fence_code_test/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% br
   33: -export([start_with_br_test/1, multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test/1,
   34:          multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test/1, ending_br_test/1]).
   35: 
   36: %% Comments
   37: -export([begin_comment_test/1, after_paragraph_comment/1, forget_closing_comment/1 ]).
   38: 
   39: %% Format
   40: -export([format_heading_test/1, format_paragraph_test/1, format_multiple_inline/1,
   41:          format_multiple_inline_format_short/1, format_multiple_inline_format_long/1,
   42:          format_multiple_inline_format_mixed/1, unmatched_format_simple/1,
   43:          unmatched_format_with_inline/1, unmatched_complex_format_with_inline/1,
   44:          format_inline_link_with_inline/1, complex_inline_format/1, skip_symbols_in_inline/1,
   45:          format_header_identifier/1]).
   46: 
   47: %% Bullet lists
   48: -export([singleton_bullet_list/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_with_format/1,
   49:          singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1,
   50:          multiline_bullet_indented_list/1, multiline_bullet_indented_list2/1,
   51:          multiline_bullet_list/1, even_nested_bullet_list/1, odd_nested_bullet_list/1,
   52:          complex_nested_bullet_list/1, complex_nested_bullet_list2/1]).
   53: 
   54: %% Numbered lists
   55: -export([singleton_numbered_list/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph/1,
   56:          singleton_numbered_list_with_format/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1,
   57:          singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1, multiline_numbered_indented_list/1,
   58:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2/1, multiline_numbered_list/1, even_nested_numbered_list/1,
   59:       odd_nested_numbered_list/1]).
   60: 
   61: -define(ERLANG_HTML, <<"application/erlang+html">>).
   62: 
   63: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   64: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
   65: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   66: 
   67: 
   68: -define(EXPECTED_FUN(Expected), {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Expected, #{}}).
   69: 
   70: all() ->
   71:     [{group, different_format_generator},
   72:      {group, module_generator},
   73:      {group, doc_generator},
   74:      {group, header_generator},
   75:      {group, quote_generator},
   76:      {group, paragraph_generator},
   77:      {group, code_generator},
   78:      {group, fence_code_generator},
   79:      {group, br_generator},
   80:      {group, comment_generator},
   81:      {group, format_generator},
   82:      {group, bullet_list_generator},
   83:      {group, numbered_list_generator}
   84:     ].
   85: 
   86: groups() ->
   87:     [{different_format_generator, [parallel], different_format_conversion_tests()},
   88:      {module_generator, [sequence], moduledoc_tests()},
   89:      {doc_generator, [parallel], doc_tests()},
   90:      {header_generator, [parallel], header_tests()},
   91:      {quote_generator, [parallel], quote_tests()},
   92:      {paragraph_generator, [parallel], paragraph_tests()},
   93:      {code_generator, [parallel], code_tests()},
   94:      {fence_code_generator, [parallel], fence_code_tests()},
   95:      {br_generator, [parallel], br_tests()},
   96:      {comment_generator, [parallel], comment_tests()},
   97:      {format_generator, [parallel], format_tests()},
   98:      {bullet_list_generator, [parallel], bullet_list_tests()},
   99:      {numbered_list_generator, [parallel], numbered_list_tests()}
  100:     ].
  101: 
  102: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  103:     Config.
  104: 
  105: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: different_format_conversion_tests() ->
  109:     [ convert_erlang_html,
  110:       convert_unknown_format
  111:     ].
  112: 
  113: moduledoc_tests() ->
  114:     [ non_existing_moduledoc,
  115:       hidden_moduledoc,
  116:       existing_moduledoc
  117:     ].
  118: 
  119: doc_tests() ->
  120:     [ non_existing_doc,
  121:       hidden_doc,
  122:       existing_doc
  123:     ].
  124: 
  125: header_tests() ->
  126:     [ h1_test,
  127:       h2_test,
  128:       h3_test,
  129:       h4_test,
  130:       h5_test,
  131:       h6_test
  132:     ].
  133: 
  134: quote_tests() ->
  135:     [ single_line_quote_test,
  136:       double_char_for_quote_test,
  137:       ignore_three_spaces_before_quote,
  138:       multiple_line_quote_test,
  139:       paragraph_in_between_test,
  140:       quote_with_anchor_test
  141:     ].
  142: 
  143: paragraph_tests() ->
  144:     [ paragraph_after_heading_test,
  145:       quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test
  146:     ].
  147: 
  148: code_tests() ->
  149:     [ single_line_code_test,
  150:       multiple_line_code_test,
  151:       paragraph_between_code_test
  152:     ].
  153: 
  154: fence_code_tests() ->
  155:   [single_line_fence_code_test,
  156:    multiple_line_fence_code_test,
  157:    paragraph_between_fence_code_test
  158:   ].
  159: 
  160: br_tests() ->
  161:     [ start_with_br_test,
  162:       multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test,
  163:       multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test,
  164:       ending_br_test
  165:     ].
  166: 
  167: comment_tests() ->
  168:     [ begin_comment_test,
  169:       after_paragraph_comment,
  170:       forget_closing_comment
  171:     ].
  172: 
  173: format_tests() ->
  174:     [ format_heading_test,
  175:       format_paragraph_test,
  176:       format_multiple_inline,
  177:       format_multiple_inline_format_long,
  178:       format_multiple_inline_format_short,
  179:       format_multiple_inline_format_mixed,
  180:       unmatched_format_simple,
  181:       unmatched_format_with_inline,
  182:       unmatched_complex_format_with_inline,
  183:       format_inline_link_with_inline,
  184:       complex_inline_format,
  185:       skip_symbols_in_inline,
  186:       format_header_identifier
  187:     ].
  188: 
  189: bullet_list_tests() ->
  190:     [ singleton_bullet_list,
  191:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  192:       singleton_bullet_list_with_format,
  193:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  194:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  195:       multiline_bullet_indented_list,
  196:       multiline_bullet_indented_list2,
  197:       multiline_bullet_list,
  198:       even_nested_bullet_list,
  199:       odd_nested_bullet_list,
  200:       complex_nested_bullet_list,
  201:       complex_nested_bullet_list2
  202:     ].
  203: 
  204: numbered_list_tests() ->
  205:     [ singleton_numbered_list,
  206:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  207:       singleton_numbered_list_with_format,
  208:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  209:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  210:       multiline_numbered_indented_list,
  211:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2,
  212:       multiline_numbered_list,
  213:       even_nested_numbered_list,
  214:       odd_nested_numbered_list
  215:     ].
  216: 
  217: convert_erlang_html(_Conf) ->
  218:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => [{p, [], [<<"Test">>]}]},
  219:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}}],
  220: 
  221:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ?ERLANG_HTML, none, #{}, Functions),
  222:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  223:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  224:     ok.
  225: 
  226: convert_unknown_format(_Conf) ->
  227:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"<text>Here</text>">>},
  228:     Functions = create_fun(Doc),
  229: 
  230:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"xml">>, Doc, #{},Functions),
  231:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  232:     ok.
  233: 
  234: non_existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  235:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, []),
  236:     _ = compile(Docs),
  237:     ok.
  238: 
  239: hidden_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  240:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, hidden, #{}, []),
  241:     _ = compile(Docs),
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  245:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  246:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  247:     #{<<"en">> := HtmlModDoc} = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  248:     H1 = header(1, <<"Here">>),
  249:     [H1] = HtmlModDoc,
  250:     ok.
  251: 
  252: non_existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  253:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(none)),
  254:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  255:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  256:     ok.
  257: 
  258: hidden_doc(_Conf) ->
  259:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(hidden)),
  260:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  261:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  262:     ok.
  263: 
  264: existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  265:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{},
  266:                         create_fun(#{<<"en">> => <<"Test">>})),
  267:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  268:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: h1_test(_Conf) ->
  272:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  273:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  274: 
  275:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [header(1, <<"Here">>)]},
  276:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  277:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  278:     ok.
  279: 
  280: h2_test(_Conf) ->
  281:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n## Header 2">>),
  282:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  283: 
  284:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h2, [], [<<"Header 2">>]}]},
  285:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  286:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  287:     ok.
  288: 
  289: h3_test(_Conf) ->
  290:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n### Header 3">>),
  291:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  292: 
  293:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h3, [], [<<"Header 3">>]}]},
  294:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  295:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  296:     ok.
  297: 
  298: h4_test(_Conf) ->
  299:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"### Here\n#### Header 4">>),
  300:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  301: 
  302:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h3, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]}]},
  303:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  304:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  305:     ok.
  306: 
  307: h5_test(_Conf) ->
  308:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  309:     DocH5 = #{<<"en">> => <<"##### H5">>},
  310:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  311:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH5, #{}}],
  312:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  313: 
  314:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  315:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  316:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  317:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  318:     ExpectedH5 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]} ]},
  319:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  320:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  321:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  322:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH5, #{}} = E2,
  323:     ok.
  324: 
  325: h6_test(_Conf) ->
  326:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  327:     DocH6 = #{<<"en">> => <<"###### H6\n## H2">>},
  328:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  329:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH6, #{}}],
  330:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  331: 
  332:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  333:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  334:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  335:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  336:     ExpectedH6 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h6, [], [<<"H6">>]},
  337:                                  {h2, [], [<<"H2">>]} ]},
  338:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  339:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  340:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  341:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH6, #{}} = E2,
  342:     ok.
  343: 
  344: 
  345: single_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  346:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  347:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  348: 
  349:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  350:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  351:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  352:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  353:     ok.
  354: 
  355: double_char_for_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  356:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n>> This is a quote">>),
  357:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  358: 
  359:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  360:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  361:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  362:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  363:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  364:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: ignore_three_spaces_before_quote(_Conf) ->
  368:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"   > # Here">>),
  369:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  370: 
  371:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here">>)),
  372:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  373:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  374:     ok.
  375: 
  376: multiple_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  377:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> # Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  378:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  379: 
  380:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here\nThis is a quote">>)),
  381:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  382:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  383:     ok.
  384: 
  385: paragraph_in_between_test(_Conf) ->
  386:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n> A quote\n## Header 2\nBody content">>),
  387:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  388: 
  389:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  390:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  391:                           quote(<<"A quote">>),
  392:                           header(2, <<"Header 2">>),
  393:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  394:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  395:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  396:     ok.
  397: 
  398: quote_with_anchor_test(_Config) ->
  399:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  400: <<"> #### Note{: .info }
  401: >
  402: > The [User's Guide](index.html) has examples and a
  403: > [Getting Started](using_ssh.md) section.">>),
  404:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  405: 
  406:     Expected = expected([quote(
  407: <<"#### Note
  408: 
  409: The User's Guide has examples and a
  410: Getting Started section.">>)]),
  411:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  412:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  413:     ok.
  414: 
  415: 
  416: paragraph_after_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  417:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n\nBody content">>),
  418:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  419: 
  420:     Expected = #{<<"en">> =>
  421:                      [ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  422:                        p(<<"This is text">>),
  423:                        p(<<"Body content">>)]},
  424:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  425:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  426:     ok.
  427: 
  428: quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  429:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> Quote 1\nThis is text\n> Quote 2\nBody content">>),
  430:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  431: 
  432:     Expected = expected([ quote(<<"Quote 1">>),
  433:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  434:                           quote(<<"Quote 2">>),
  435:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  436:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  437:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  438:     ok.
  439: 
  440: single_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  441:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n    This is code">>),
  442:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  443: 
  444:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  445:                           code(<<"This is code">>)]),
  446:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  447:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  448:     ok.
  449: 
  450: multiple_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  451:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"    # Here\n    This is code\n        Nested Line">>),
  452:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  453: 
  454:     Expected = expected(code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>)),
  455:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  456:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  457:     ok.
  458: 
  459: paragraph_between_code_test(_Conf) ->
  460:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a paragraph\n",
  461:                               "\n",
  462:                               "    # Here\n",
  463:                               "    This is code\n",
  464:                               "        Nested Line\n",
  465:                               "Another paragraph">>),
  466:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  467: 
  468:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"This is a paragraph">>),
  469:                           code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>),
  470:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  471:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  472:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  473:     ok.
  474: 
  475: single_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  476:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  477: ```erlang
  478: test() -> ok.
  479: ```">>),
  480:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  481:     Expected = expected([ code(<<"test() -> ok.">>)]),
  482:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  483:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  484:     ok.
  485: 
  486: multiple_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  487:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  488: ```erlang
  489: test() ->
  490:   ok.
  491: ```">>),
  492:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  493:     Expected = expected([ code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  494:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  495:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  496:     ok.
  497: 
  498: 
  499: paragraph_between_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  500:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a test:
  501: ```erlang
  502: test() ->
  503:   ok.
  504: ```">>),
  505:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  506:     Expected = expected([p(<<"This is a test:">>),
  507:                          code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  508:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  509:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  510:     ok.
  511: 
  512: 
  513: start_with_br_test(_Conf) ->
  514:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  515:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  516:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  517:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  518:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  519:     ok.
  520: 
  521: multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  522:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\nAnother paragraph\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  523:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  524:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Another paragraph">>),
  525:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  526:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  527:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  528:     ok.
  529: 
  530: multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  531:   Text = """
  532: Returns a new list `List3`, which is made from the elements of `List1` followed
  533: by the elements of `List2`.
  534: """,
  535:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(list_to_binary(Text)),
  536:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  537:     Expected = expected([p([<<"Returns a new list ">>,
  538:                             inline_code(<<"List3">>),
  539:                             <<", which is made from the elements of ">>,
  540:                             inline_code(<<"List1">>), <<" followed">>,
  541:                             <<"\nby the elements of ">>,
  542:                             inline_code(<<"List2">>), <<".">>])]),
  543:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  544:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  545:     ok.
  546: 
  547: ending_br_test(_Conf) ->
  548:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n">>),
  549:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  550:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  551:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  552:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  553:     ok.
  554: 
  555: begin_comment_test(_Conf) ->
  556:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  557:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  558:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  559:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  560:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  561:     ok.
  562: 
  563: after_paragraph_comment(_Conf) ->
  564:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  565:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  566:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>), p(<<"Test">>)]),
  567:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  568:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  569:     ok.
  570: 
  571: forget_closing_comment(_Conf) ->
  572:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore Test">>),
  573:     {'EXIT', {missing_close_comment, _}} = catch compile(Docs),
  574:     ok.
  575: 
  576: format_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  577:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# **H1**\n## _H2_\n### `H3`">>),
  578:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  579:     Expected = expected([ header(1, em(<<"H1">>)),
  580:                           header(2, it(<<"H2">>)),
  581:                           header(3, inline_code(<<"H3">>))
  582:                         ]),
  583:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  584:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  585:     ok.
  586: 
  587: format_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  588:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1** *HH* _H2_ __H3__ `code`">>),
  589:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  590:     Expected = expected([ p([ em(<<"H1">>),
  591:                               <<" ">>,
  592:                               it(<<"HH">>),
  593:                               <<" ">>,
  594:                               it(<<"H2">>),
  595:                               <<" ">>,
  596:                               em(<<"H3">>),
  597:                               <<" ">>,
  598:                               inline_code(<<"code">>)
  599:                             ])
  600:                         ]),
  601:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  602:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  603:     ok.
  604: 
  605: format_multiple_inline(_Conf) ->
  606:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 *HH***">>),
  607:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  608:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  609:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  610:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  611:     ok.
  612: 
  613: format_multiple_inline_format_long(_Conf) ->
  614:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 __HH__**">>),
  615:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  616:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, em(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  617:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  618:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  619:     ok.
  620: 
  621: format_multiple_inline_format_short(_Conf) ->
  622:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"_H1 *HH*_">>),
  623:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  624:     Expected = expected([ p([ it([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  625:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  626:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  627:     ok.
  628: 
  629: format_multiple_inline_format_mixed(_Conf) ->
  630:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**__ _there_">>),
  631:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  632:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>, em(<<"test2">>)]),
  633:                               <<" ">>,
  634:                               it(<<"there">>)])
  635:                         ]),
  636:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  637:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  638:     ok.
  639: 
  640: unmatched_format_simple(_Conf) ->
  641:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold*">>),
  642:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  643:     Expected = expected([ p([<<"**Bold*">> ])]),
  644:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  645:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  646: 
  647: unmatched_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  648:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold *Italics*">>),
  649:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  650:     Expected = expected(p([<<"**Bold ">>, it(<<"Italics">>) ])),
  651:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  652:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  653: 
  654: unmatched_complex_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  655:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**_ _there_">>),
  656:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  657:     Expected = expected([ p([ <<"__H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>,
  658:                               em(<<"test2">>),
  659:                               it(<<" ">>),
  660:                               <<"there_">>])
  661:                         ]),
  662:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  663:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  664:     ok.
  665: 
  666: format_inline_link_with_inline(_Config) ->
  667:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"[`splitwith/2`](`splitwith/2`) behaves as if">>),
  668:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  669:     Expected = expected([ p([inline_code(<<"splitwith/2">>),<<" behaves as if">>])]),
  670:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  671:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  672:     ok.
  673: 
  674: complex_inline_format(_Config) ->
  675:   %% The complexity here comes from the _, where the alg needs to backtrack
  676:   %% add the _ to an existing buffer, and continue where it left off using
  677:   %% any previous opening format characters, in this case **.
  678:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}`**">>),
  679:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  680:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}">>)))),
  681:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  682:   ok.
  683: 
  684: skip_symbols_in_inline(_Config) ->
  685:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{the_beginning, the_end}`**">>),
  686:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  687:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{the_beginning, the_end}">>)))),
  688:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  689:   ok.
  690: 
  691: format_header_identifier(_Config) ->
  692:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"## Test {: #id .class} there">>),
  693:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  694:   Expected = expected([{h2, [], [<<"Test  there">>]}]),
  695:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  696:   ok.
  697: 
  698: singleton_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  699:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner">>),
  700:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  701:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))])]),
  702:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  703:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  704:     ok.
  705: 
  706: singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->
  707:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  708:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  709:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)]),
  710:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  711:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  712:     ok.
  713: 
  714: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph(_Config) ->
  715:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  This is a new paragraph">>),
  716:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  717:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  718:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  719:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  720:     ok.
  721: 
  722: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2(_Config) ->
  723:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  724:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  725:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  726:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  727:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  728:     ok.
  729: 
  730: 
  731: singleton_bullet_list_with_format(_Config) ->
  732:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* *One* __liner__">>),
  733:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  734:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p([it(<<"One">>), <<" ">>,  em(<<"liner">>)]))])]),
  735:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  736:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  737:     ok.
  738: 
  739: multiline_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  740:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n* Second line">>),
  741:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  742:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  743:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  744:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  745:     ok.
  746: 
  747: multiline_bullet_indented_list(_Config) ->
  748:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  749:              <<"  * One liner\n  * Second line">>),
  750:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  751:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  752:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  753:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  754:     ok.
  755: 
  756: multiline_bullet_indented_list2(_Config) ->
  757:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  758:              <<"  * _One liner_\n  * _Second_ `line`">>),
  759:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  760:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  761:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))])]),
  762:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  763:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  764:     ok.
  765: 
  766: even_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  767:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n  * Second nested line">>),
  768:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  769:     Expected = expected([ul([
  770:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  771:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  772:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  773:                                      ])
  774:                                 ])
  775:                             ])]),
  776:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  777:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  778:     ok.
  779: 
  780: odd_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  781:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n  * Second nested line\n  * Third nested line">>),
  782:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  783:     Expected = expected([ul([
  784:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  785:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  786:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  787:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  788:                                      ])
  789:                                 ])
  790:                             ])]),
  791:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  792:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  793:     ok.
  794: 
  795: complex_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  796:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n* Second line">>),
  797:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  798:     Expected = expected([ul([
  799:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  800:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)) ])
  801:                                 ]),
  802:                              li([p(<<"Second line">>)])
  803:                             ])]),
  804:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  805:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  806:     ok.
  807: 
  808: complex_nested_bullet_list2(_Config) ->
  809:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  810: * One liner
  811:   * First nested line
  812:     * Second level nested line
  813:   * Second nested line
  814:     * Another nested line
  815: * Second one liner">>),
  816:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  817:     Expected = expected([ul([
  818:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  819:                                   ul([ li([
  820:                                            p(<<"First nested line">>),
  821:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Second level nested line">>)])])
  822:                                           ]),
  823:                                        li([
  824:                                            p(<<"Second nested line">>),
  825:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Another nested line">>)])])
  826:                                           ])
  827:                                      ])
  828:                                 ]),
  829:                              li([ p(<<"Second one liner">>)])
  830:                             ])]),
  831:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  832:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  833:     ok.
  834: 
  835: singleton_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  836:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner">>),
  837:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  838:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>))])]),
  839:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  840:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  841:     ok.
  842: 
  843: 
  844: singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->

  846:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  847:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)]),
  848:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  849:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  850:     ok.
  851: 
  852: singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph(_Config) ->
  853:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  This is a new paragraph">>),
  854:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  855:     Expected = expected([ol([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  856:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  857:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  858:     ok.
  859: 
  860: singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2(_Config) ->
  861:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  862:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  863:     Expected = expected([ol([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  864:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  865:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  866:     ok.
  867: 
  868: 
  869: singleton_numbered_list_with_format(_Config) ->
  870:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. *One* __liner__">>),
  871:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  872:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p([it(<<"One">>), <<" ">>,  em(<<"liner">>)]))])]),
  873:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  874:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  875:     ok.
  876: 
  877: multiline_numbered_indented_list(_Config) ->
  878:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"  1. One liner\n  2. Second line">>),
  879:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  880:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  881:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  882:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  883:     ok.
  884: 
  885: multiline_numbered_indented_list2(_Config) ->
  886:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  887:              <<"  1. _One liner_\n  2. _Second_ `line`">>),
  888:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  889:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  890:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))])]),
  891:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  892:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  893:     ok.
  894: 
  895: multiline_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  896:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n2. Second line">>),
  897:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  898:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  899:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  900:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  901:     ok.
  902: 
  903: even_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  904:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line">>),
  905:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  906:     Expected = expected([ol([
  907:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  908:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  909:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  910:                                      ])
  911:                                 ])
  912:                             ])]),
  913:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  914:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  915:     ok.
  916: 
  917: odd_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  918:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line\n  3. Third nested line">>),
  919:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  920:     Expected = expected([ol([
  921:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  922:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  923:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  924:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  925:                                      ])
  926:                                 ])
  927:                             ])]),
  928:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  929:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  930:     ok.
  931: 
  932: 
  933: header(Level, Text) when is_integer(Level) ->
  934:     HeadingLevel = integer_to_list(Level),
  935:     HeadingLevelAtom = list_to_existing_atom("h" ++ HeadingLevel),
  936:     {HeadingLevelAtom, [], [Text]}.
  937: 
  938: quote(X) ->
  939:     {pre,[],[{code,[],[X]}]}.
  940: 
  941: code(X) ->
  942:     {pre,[],[inline_code(X)]}.
  943: 
  944: inline_code(X) ->
  945:     {code,[],[X]}.
  946: 
  947: p(X) when is_list(X) ->
  948:     {p, [], X};
  949: p(X) when is_tuple(X); is_binary(X) ->
  950:     p([X]).
  951: 
  952: em(X) when is_list(X) ->
  953:     {em, [], X};
  954: em(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  955:     em([X]).
  956: 
  957: it(X) when is_list(X) ->
  958:     {i, [], X};
  959: it(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  960:     it([X]).
  961: 
  962: ul(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  963:     {ul, [], Items}.
  964: 
  965: ol(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  966:     {ol, [], Items}.
  967: 
  968: li(Item) when is_tuple(Item); is_binary(Item) ->
  969:     li([Item]);
  970: li(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  971:     {li, [], Items}.
  972: 
  973: -spec create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) -> #docs_v1{} when
  974:       Language  :: atom(),
  975:       Mime      :: binary(),
  976:       ModuleDoc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  977:       Metadata  :: map(),
  978:       Docs      :: [{{Kind, Name, Arity},
  979:                      Anno :: erl_anno:anno(),
  980:                      Signature :: [binary()],
  981:                      Doc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  982:                      Metadata :: map()
  983:                     }],
  984:       Kind      :: function | type | callback,
  985:       Name      :: atom(),
  986:       Arity     :: non_neg_integer(),
  987:       DocLanguage :: binary(),
  988:       DocValue :: binary() | term().
  989: create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) ->
  990:     #docs_v1{anno = [],
  991:              beam_language = Language,
  992:              format = Mime,
  993:              module_doc = ModuleDoc,
  994:              metadata = maps:merge(#{ otp_doc_vsn => ?CURR_DOC_VERSION }, Metadata),
  995:              docs = Docs}.
  996: 
  997: extract_moduledoc(Docs) ->
  998:     Docs#docs_v1.module_doc.
  999: 
 1000: extract_doc(Docs) ->
 1001:     Docs#docs_v1.docs.
 1002: 
 1003: extract_format(Docs) ->
 1004:     Docs#docs_v1.format.
 1005: 
 1006: create_eep48_doc(Doc) when is_binary(Doc) ->
 1007:     create_eep48_doc(Doc, <<"text/markdown">>).
 1008: 
 1009: create_eep48_doc(Doc, Format) when is_binary(Doc) ->
 1010:     Docs = #{<<"en">> => Doc},
 1011:     create_eep48(erlang, Format, Docs, #{}, create_fun(Docs)).
 1012: 
 1013: create_fun(Docs) ->
 1014:     [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Docs, #{}}].
 1015: 
 1016: 
 1017: expected(X) when is_list(X)->
 1018:     #{<<"en">> => X};
 1019: expected(X) when is_tuple(X) ->
 1020:     expected([X]).
 1021: 
 1022: compile(Docs) ->
 1023:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
 1024:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
 1025:     ?NATIVE_FORMAT = extract_format(HtmlDocs),
 1026:     HtmlDocs.
